history.content:
I just contacted a graduate advisor with this exact same question and was given this response:

""""""""""

we use this form to make changes for EECS grad students, https://berkeley.app.box.com/v/grad-class-sched-petition.
Please make sure you and your advisor sign at the bottom.  Then you can send it to Michael for processing.  I suggest you get it to Michael as soon as possible, and no later than this week if you want the changes to be made.  After that, our access is temporarily terminated for the semester and we won't be able to make changes for you.
""""""""""
Hope this helps!

Does anyone know what the policies are regarding late change of grade or drop petitions work for 5th year master's students. I'm looking to potentially change the grade of a class I'm taking. This class isn't used to satisfy my requirements since it's a breadth class and I already satisfied 8 units of breadths. If it helps, I also never used my green petition while I was an undergrad. If anyone knows anything about this process, I would appreciate it!
history.subject: 5th Year Masters Late Drop/Grade Change
